parameters.description: How many records this API returned

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Created=0 | NotAcquired=10 | Acquired=20,  commission distribution status

parameters.name: dateMonth
parameters.description: Month, 1 = Jan. Either year+month, year, or no year and month filter

parameters.name: dateYear
parameters.description: Year. Either year+month, year, or no year and month filter
